meanings.definition: A type of bet in horse racing where the bettor selects two horses to finish in first and second place in any order.
meanings.sent1: I placed a quinelas on the two fastest horses in the race.
meanings.sent2: The quinelas bet allows flexibility in choosing the winning horses.
meanings.sent3: The quinelas bet made the horse race even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Choosing the winning horses felt like cracking a code with the quinelas bet.
meanings.sent5: The quinelas bet made me feel like a horse racing expert.

meanings.definition: A type of bet in greyhound racing where the bettor selects two dogs to finish in first and second place in any order.
meanings.sent1: She won big with a quinelas on the two greyhounds she picked.
meanings.sent2: The quinelas bet in greyhound racing is popular among bettors.
meanings.sent3: The quinelas bet on the greyhounds had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: Winning with the quinelas bet felt like hitting the jackpot.
meanings.sent5: The quinelas bet made the greyhound race unforgettable.
